### EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been created on the map.

### ERROR TIPS
No errors have been reported.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* `Current inventory`: Inventory object containing items such as `transport-belt`, `burner-inserter`, `burner-mining-drill`, `wood`, `coal`, `stone`, and `iron-ore`.
* `Entities on the map`: List of entities on the map, but the data is stale and not available.
